ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s just a personal style. It s like finding pickles in a cheese burger. Some people hate em. Some people like em. Some people don t care. The alternate
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:02 PM 7/11/2003 -0700, you wrote:
>nope sorry i like the way i type ok? i really like it alot and its much
>much ezier ( or in your tongue easier) c (see) how much funner and ezier
>(easier)it is!!?? now , i hate to sound rude, but will U (YOU) plz
>(please) shut up and let ppl(people) talk or type like they want to!! and
>there r (are) lots of other ppl (people) that type like this and no one
>ever says ne(any) thing!! now leave us alone!!!!!
>
>Gina Peterson <gina@...> wrote:

It's just a personal style. It's like finding pickles in a cheese burger.
Some people hate em. Some people like em. Some people don't care. The
alternate style in spelling makes the words a little bit harder to follow
for people who aren't used to the style. That annoys some people because is
slows down their reading and they get no pleasure out of the style. Other
people think it's cool. I'll take my cheese burgers with or without
pickles. It's no skin off of my nose to let people enjoy what they enjoy.
Sometimes people just happen to like things that I don't. What's wrong with
that? Not a thing. I wish them all well. Have fun everyone.

Edward Fox
